root.name: Segata Sanshirou Shinken Yuugi
root.description: OverviewSegata Sanshirou Shinken Yuugi is a Sega Saturn game released by Sega exclusively within Japan. Starring the system's titular mascot in that region, the game tasks you with playing various minigames based on the character's famous ads after listening to a dramatic narration about his adventures. These include activities such as skating on ice, traversing through burning buildings, and wrestling robots in a minefield, amongst other things. Successful completion of the minigames unlock the Segata Sanshirou ads individually, which can then be viewed at any time. The game also features a quasi-jukebox mode that features just the audio portion of each commercial, none of which need to be unlocked ahead of time.
